short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Cleans up the URL of popular shopping sites; removing useless parts of the URL and making them much easier to copy or share.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Takes super-long URLs from shopping sites like Amazon, AliExpress, Walmart and more, and converts the URL to a much shorter, friendlier version you can share with others.

With one click, go from this ugly mess...
https://www.amazon.com/TABLETOPICS-Best-Things-Ever-Conversations/dp/B00XQ6P9UG/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&qid=1526466476&sr=8-1&keywords=best+thing+ever

...to this beauty!:
https://www.amazon.com/dp/B00XQ6P9UG/

Click on the extension's icon, and the new URL will be copied to your clipboard automatically.


Supported merchants: AliExpress, Amazon, Costco, eBay, Temu, and more. If you'd like other merchants to be added, drop us a note.
